plays.text: Goal scored by Sergei Zubov assisted by Mike Modano and Brenden Morrow
Penalty to Mike York 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Marty Turco
Penalty to Richard Matvichuk 2 minutes for High Sticking Ethan Moreau
Penalty to Eric Brewer 2 minutes for High Sticking Ulf Dahlen
Penalty to Scott Ferguson 2 minutes for Slashing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Ethan Moreau 2 minutes for Slashing Sergei Zubov
Penalty to Scott Young 2 minutes for Tripping Todd Marchant
Penalty to Marty Turco 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified) served by Brenden Morrow
Goal scored by Shawn Horcoff unassisted
Penalty to Brad Isbister 2 minutes for Hooking Derian Hatcher
Goal scored by Stu Barnes assisted by Ulf Dahlen and Philippe Boucher
Goal scored by Niko Kapanen assisted by Jere Lehtinen and Rob DiMaio
Penalty to Brenden Morrow 2 minutes for Tripping Tommy Salo
Penalty to Mike Comrie 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
